qFileName.desc:
In server mode, this property corresponds to the app identifier (GUID).
In desktop mode, this property corresponds to the full path of the app.

qLastReloadTime.desc: Date and time of the last reload of the app in ISO format.

qModified.desc: Is set to true if the app has been updated since the last save.

qHasScript.desc: Is set to true if a script is defined in the app.

qHasData.desc: Is set to true if the app contains data following a script reload.

qReadOnly.desc: If set to true, it means that the app is read-only.

qIsOpenedWithoutData.desc: If set to true, it means that the app was opened without loading its data.
